storyInfo: Initially at odds, the three parties decide to handle the out-of-control drones together. Marcille shows off her talents as one of her school's brightest students, leading the drones out into the empty fieldsâ€”which just happen to be the pioneers' corn fields!

attributes.content: I-Is it over? Did we manage to take care of them all?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hah... Hah... I'm beat...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hahaha! Not bad, girlie! You've got quite a few tricks up your sleeve. I sure am a big fan of casters!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Oh... Good... They aren't at fisticuffs any longer... Good, good, as long as everyone's fine...
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: C'mon, let's go, I'm in a good mood today! You can have a taste of some of my corn!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Boss, you...
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Hmm? ...Wait, corn...
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: The laughter dies on the pioneer's lips as he raises his weapon at the team of four.
*huff*... *huff*... Guess he remembered. And here I was thinking we could bury the hatchet.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Marcille raises her staff, strands of her hair rippling with magic.
Wha? Are we back at this already? Really? You were all battle buddies earlier, surely that's got to count for something, right?
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Hmph!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: *huff*... *huff*...
attributes.name: Chilchuck & Senshi

attributes.content: Let's not go for magic right away, Marcille.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: We're all tired out from dealing with those things. There's no benefit in starting up another fight.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: We'll count down from three, lower our weapons, go back the way we came, and agree not to bother each other for the night. How about that?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *cough*! How... about...... that...........?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Look, this guy's plenty sincere, alright? He's still offering even after he got a bomb chucked at him! Why not think his offer over?
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Our boys are tuckered out too, boss. I don't think fighting'll do us any good neither.
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: ...Fine. We'll get out of each other's hair for the night. Start counting.
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Oh, yes, good!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Three, two, one!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Great... I can sleep soundly tonight...
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Zzz...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Marcille? Marcille?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Zzz... Eh...?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Ah! Wh-What happened?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: We were thinking of going to examine the bodies of those monsters earlier, and while we're at it...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Well, they looked like crabs to me, so they might taste like mimics.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Ahh, the chewiness of mimics... The more you chew it, the better the flavor gets.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Just don't use my lockpicks to scoop the meat out again.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: But they've got just the right shape for it!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: 'Bob's Gourmet Guide' says they're edible. Apparently they're delicious, as long as you can get through the shell! Don't you want to have a taste?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Absolutely not! Besides, if those villagers think we're sneaking back onto the battlefield for an ambush, we might get into another fight!
attributes.name: Marcille
Marcille
attributes.content: Those magic items flying all over the place were a pain to deal with, and there's still plenty of them out there! Not to mention, I'm still tired asâ€”

attributes.name: Marcille
attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.joined: Those magic items flying all over the place were a pain to deal with, and there's still plenty of them out there! Not to mention, I'm still tired asâ€”Huh?

attributes.content: Munchmunchmunch... Huh?
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Munch... Huh?
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Huh???
attributes.name: Pioneers and Laios's Party

attributes.content: The pioneers freeze in the middle of stuffing gloompincer legs into their mouths.
The only sound breaking the awkward silence is the crackling of the bonfire.
The sparks plik and plak amidst the flames.
Their pincers and limbs are stuffed full of flesh. No wonder they can support such heavy shells, as well as crush those magic items...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: So you cut them open from the belly, then pull back their shell... I see now. Looks like you prepare these things the same way you do mimics.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Then... Oooh...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: That smells amazing!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Err... Wanna try some?
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: (Stomach groans)
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Laios accepts the roasted meat, hesitates for a moment, then stuffs it into his mouth.
IT'S DELICIOUS!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Haha! It's all in the techniqueâ€”*cough*! Gah...
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Want a taste?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...Eh? It really is chewy! And delicious too!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Here, you guys have some as well.
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Huh? For me? Thanks...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: It's roasted just right, so it hasn't lost any moisture. It even tastes just like mimic!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Alright, just eat already.
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Keep your lips shut once you're done, I've got a reputation to keep.
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Not a word about tonight, you hear?
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: (How is it you can be at each others' throats during the day, but be eating roast gloompincer together at night?! Guess there wasn't any need for me to rush over...)
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Just going for a midnight tinkle, don't mind me, haha.
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Gosh darnit... C'mon over! You've given us meds, and I never forget a debt.
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: I'll let you guys off this time...
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: ...No, I can't! My barn! Why'd you guys blow up my barn?!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: We didn't! It was your magic items that attacked us! We had to counter their magic in self-defense!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: M-Magic items? You mean my drones? They went nuts, weren't listening to me!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Huh?! But you still came out and attacked us!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Because you were gonna steal our crops!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: You thought we were whatâ€”
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Alright, alright, I've heard enough, I get what happened now! This was all one big misunderstanding!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Your drones went amok and bombed them by accident, they thought you were attacking them, then you thought they were trying to take your stuff using the Catastrophe as cover. One! Big! Misunderstanding!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: So, how about we all shake hands and let bygones be bygones?
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Forget it.
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: I'm... frozen...stiff...!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: How...about....we...take...care...of...them...first...?
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: The drone relay's busted. I took a couple of courses on equipment maintenance, let me see if there's a way to fix it...
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Gah! Anyone understand Originium circuits enough to come help me out? Everyone else handle the drones, get them to use up their bombs! I can't get anything done while I'm getting pelted by them!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Go on then, we'll draw them away! Y'all work quick, ya hear!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Aaaaaaaahhhhhhhhâ€“â€“â€“â€“
attributes.name: Pioneers

attributes.content: Only thing I can do is help them remove the cover of this 'drone relay' quicker! Marcille, do you seriously have no way to handle those things? We can't ask Senshi to boil them all!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Uh... Umm... You'd need to give me time to learn a whole new system of magic...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Two more magic items flying over! Their flight speeds follow a pattern, and so do their patrol routes...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Each one carries a single bomb. Seems they fly away as soon as they drop it. Are they returning to their nest to replenish their stock?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I can't think of anything on such short notice...
attributes.name: Laios & Marcille

attributes.content: I've got a plan.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Laios & Marcille

attributes.content: You think these items use some magic or other to know who's an enemy?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Well, they're not monsters. They don't have eyes, but since they can only throw a bomb once, they must have some way to tell friend from foe...?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Right, lad. I noticed earlier that they didn't pay any attention to a dead gloompincer.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: But then I saw a live one walk into one's range by accident. At first, no response, just like the dead one, but the moment the gloompincer raised its pincers, it got a bomb thrown at it.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: ...So they detect 'hostility'? The moment they sense it, they attack?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Oh, I've got a way to make them use up their bombs then!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I'll use a familiar to act as bait!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: A familiar?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Nothing too complex, I just need somethings full of hostility. I can use the gloompincers from earlier!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Get me some fruit from the forest to add in as well. Just pile them up while I think of what I want to make it look like...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Whoa whoa whoa, why're you cutting your hair all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Hair's full of magical power. It's a good resource to have on hand.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Put flour, sugar, and some butter in the potâ€¦ Now I just need a reference from real life.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hmm? Why're you looking at me like that?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Ah, I know what I want to use as the model!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: (Incants)...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Is it done? What's it look like? Let me see!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hey, isn't that me?!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Alright, time for a test run...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Left leg, right leg, left leg, right leg...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: (Moves feet to match Marcille's movements)
attributes.name: Laios (Familiar Ver.)

attributes.content: Okay, now run!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Good, let's get going!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: AHHH! AHHHHHHHHH!!!!
attributes.name: Pioneers

attributes.content: Have you repaired it yet?! We're on our last legs here!
attributes.name: Pioneers

attributes.content: Don't worry! You'll be fine!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: With a cheer, the pioneers turn their heads, but all they see is a strange figure running towards them at full speed, shouting in a stiff voice they don't recognize.

They have faced bloodthirsty wild beasts, survived Catastrophes big and small, and have been pelted by barrages of bombs from dozens of drones, but the sight is still enough to make the pioneers tremble in fear.
A man down on all fours, his long tongue rolling from his slobbering maw, his eyes bulging, screech as he crawls towards them at full speed!

attributes.name: Marcille
attributes.content: Left leg! Right leg! Left leg! Right leg! Gah...

attributes.name: Marcille
attributes.content: Why did I make it move that way?!?
attributes.joined: Left leg! Right leg! Left leg! Right leg! Gah...Why did I make it move that way?!?

attributes.content: (Moves feet to match Marcille's movements)
attributes.name: Laios (Familiar Ver.)

attributes.content: ...AHHHHHH! RUN FOR IT!!
attributes.name: Pioneers
Marcille
attributes.content: Just get back as fast as you can! I'll distract the magic items! Don't stop here, head back toâ€”

attributes.name: Marcille
attributes.content: Eh? Where'd everyone go?
attributes.joined: Just get back as fast as you can! I'll distract the magic items! Don't stop here, head back toâ€”Eh? Where'd everyone go?

attributes.content: ...! The items must have noticed us!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I just need to lead them somewhere far from everyone else, then get them to throw all their bombs at the familiar!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: This area is quite flat, so it should be fineâ€¦
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Ah! I nearly forgot! They're not going to wait for my command to start attacking! They've already begun!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: No good, it's still too close; I'll get hit too. I need to find somewhere a bit further away!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: It's working! Marcille got the drones to head over there!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Now they just need to use up all their bombs! She's amazing!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Your 'magic' sure is real weirâ€”I mean, great.
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Argh! They're way more persistent than I expected!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Laios (Familiar Ver.)

attributes.content: Wait, that noise...?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: They're about to fire?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: This place... Would here be alright? Are we far enough? Okay, I'm going to get out of here! It's all up to you now, Fami-Laios! I'm releasing control over you!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Gurgh...
attributes.name: Laios (Familiar Ver.)

attributes.content: Hey, I see her running out into the open! The drones are going to drop bombs!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Hooray! She's done it!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: That girlie sure is something... I always said I was a big fan of casters.
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Yeah, Marcille's amazing.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Wait, I just remembered something...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Isn't that where the corn fields are?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: I think you might be right...
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Hey, wait! MY... MY CORN FIELDS!!!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: They're about to fire!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I'll hide hereâ€”Whoa!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Explosions resound all around her, as expected.
But they are joined by the sweet scent of corn wafting through the air.
Marcille raises her head. It's like time itself has slowed, to the point that she can see every kernel fly through the sky, popping into fragrant popcorn of purest white under the bombardment.
The popcorn falls, floats, flutters like snow, landing on the tip of her nose.
Marcille shudders at what she has done.
...Huh?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Before she can do anything else, she is buried in an avalanche of fluffy white popcorn.
Gurgh...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Th-This is...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Popcorn!
I'm super strong! Even with a hundred... Err, wait, ninety-nine pieces of popcorn in front of me, I can eat them all!
Hyah! Bam! Pow!
Mount Popcorn, here I come!
Marcille! Marcille?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Marcille! Where are you? Can you hear us?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Oh no... We can't resurrect Marcille here!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Munchmunchmunch...
Hmm, that sounds familiar...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: That's the sound of Kay eating!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Munchmunchmunch... Oh! Mister Beard! It's you guys!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Why are you here, lass?!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I smelled something real tasty, so I ran over!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Come on, Mister Beard, Mister Short, Mister Blond! There's so much popcorn and frozen fruit to eat!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Munchmunchmunch... Oh yeah... munchmunchmunch... you're here too, Miss Blonde!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Don't...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Don't... eat... my... HAIR!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Pfweh! Sorry! I didn't mean to!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Marcille! You're alive!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... Just buried, not bombed.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Wow! This sticky stuff smells great!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Brr, it's all frozen! Real different from the popcorn!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: *sigh*... Sure is...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Want to try some?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Munchmunch... So frosty and sweet! Yummy!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Oh thank heavens, I'm glad you're alright!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Eh? ...Kay?!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Huh? Oh, I remember you!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: You were the one who came hunting with me! Did you get anything? I got looooots of stuff, but I ate it all!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Never mind. The guys before me were right. As long as I find you, it's mission completeâ€”Hey, wait, what're you eating?! Spit that out!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Munchmunchmunch!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Don't just eat stuff off the ground! C'mon, spit it out already!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Munchmunchmunch... *gulp*!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: AHHHH!!!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Don't worry, she's just eating popcorn.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Heavens to Betsy! What doggone disaster! That corn was gonna go to market!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Boss, don't say that, you're a Perro yourself...
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: How'm I supposed to sell any of this after it's been wrecked like this?!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: I mean, you can sell popcorn. There's definitely people willing to buy it, out by the tents.
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Throw in some butter and sugar, warm it up a bit while giving it a stir... Good, the smell's coming through! Not bad for a snack.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Pound the frozen fruit, stir in some batter from the familiar, shape it for presentation's sake... and you've got ice cream!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: There you have it, a sweet treat!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Eh... Hmm... I guess this popcorn's good enough to sell...
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Not like I got much choice now...
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: I'll have a bite, then...
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Not yet recovered?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Just breathed in a bit too much corn smell all at once.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: It's really delicious, though.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The popcorn's warm and buttery, sweet and crisp...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The ice cream's amazing, too. The fruit's so fresh, and with such a smooth texture...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Best of all, no monster meat.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Mhm. Lucky me.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *phew*... Glad that's all done and dusted.
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Mmm... Heheh... Yummy, yummy ice cream...
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: *sigh* You sure know how to make people worry, kid.
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Hey, I'll be taking her home now. You guys don't start fighting once I'm gone, alright?
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah, I know.
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Ryan helps up Ceobe, fast asleep on the ground after eating her fill, and takes her to the nearby vehicle.
Its engine roars to life, and putters away into the distance.
Hmm? Where's Kay gone?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: You mean that other girlie? Ryan's taken her home.
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Ryan? Why?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Sounded like he was on some sort of mission for Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Wait, did you say Rhodes Island?! Ryan's from Rhodes Island?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Yeah. Why? What's got you in such a tizzy?
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Laios!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Does that mean it's close by?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Uh, yeah, they're stopped a few kilometers away.
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Ryan just left. If we start running now, we can catch up.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Let's go then! We can't afford to lose their trail again!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: What're they on about?
attributes.name: Pioneer B
